alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tangipahoa and northwestern Washington Parishes, Walthall and eastern Pike Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tylertown, or 12 miles north of Franklinton, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tylertown, Salem and Mount Herman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
